description: T1 - Lime: Rear of no.33; Too large for site, within 2m of building; Re-pollard back to most recent pruning points. T2 - Lime: Rear of no.35; Too large for site, within 2m of building; Re-pollard back to most recent pruning points. T3 - Lime: Rear of no.36; Too large for site, within 2m of building; Re-pollard back to most recent pruning points.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: <p><i style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">T1 - Lime: Rear of no.33; Too large for site, within 2m of building; Re-pollard back to most recent pruning points.&nbsp; T2 - Lime: Rear of no.35; Too large for site, within 2m of building; Re-pollard back to most recent pruning points.&nbsp; T3 - Lime: Rear of no.36; Too large for site, within 2m of building; Re-pollard back to most recent pruning points.</i><br></p>

Failure to ensure the proposed works are carried out to these standards</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">may result in damage to the tree(s) and may result in legal action by the Council.</span></p><p></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Reason</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.</span></p><div><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>
